alert.note: Alert for Cedar; Clinton; Muscatine (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS QuadCities (Eastern Iowa and Northwestern Illinois - Quad Cities)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued November 05 at 7:47AM CDT by NWS QuadCities
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Cedar, northwestern Muscatine and west central Clinton Counties through 830 AM CDT... At 747 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Nichols, or 9 miles northwest of Muscatine, moving north at 45 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. This strong thunderstorm will be near... West Liberty and Atalissa around 755 AM CDT. Rochester around 805 AM CDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Tipton and Stanwood. This includes Interstate 80 in Iowa between mile markers 258 and 271. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
